articles.description: Hammerfall helped keep heavy metal alive in the 90s, but new album Hammer Of Dawn shows their quest is far from over
articles.title: Hammerfall's Joacim Cans: "The time to pass the torch was years ago"

articles.author: Davey Ferchow
articles.description:
The monthly most expensive list is back and better than ever with some hard-to-find hard rock, classic punk, and one record filled with fake blood! Before getting to the blood-filled LP, let’s break down a few trends that the February 2022 list has surfaced. This month, there are two releases that made the list twice. […]
The post Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in February 2022 appeared first on Discogs Blog.
articles.title: Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in February 2022
